00028 #ifndef MATRIXCHECK_H
00029 #define MATRIXCHECK_H
00030 
00031 #include "util/RegressionCheck.h"
00032 #include "util/Util.h"
00033 #include "util/Verbose.h"
00034 //
00035 #include <cassert>
00036 #include <cstdlib>
00037 #include <cstring>
00038 #include <string>
00039 //
00040 
00046 class MatrixCheck : public RegressionCheck {
00047 
00048 public:
00049 
00063   MatrixCheck(
00064                 const std::string &generated, 
00065                 const std::string &gold, 
00066                 double eps, 
00067                 int rowSkip, 
00068                 int colSkip, 
00069                 bool matchNames, 
00070                 unsigned int allowedMisMatch) :
00071     m_Generated(generated), m_Gold(gold), m_Epsilon(eps),
00072     m_RowSkip(rowSkip), m_ColSkip(colSkip), m_MatchNames(matchNames),
00073     m_AllowedMisMatch(allowedMisMatch) { 
00074         m_Name = Util::fileRoot(generated);
00075     }
00076 
00082     bool check(std::string &msg) {
00083     std::string generated(m_Generated), gold(m_Gold);
00084     msg = "";
00085     bool success = true;
00086     // Fix pathnames to work for this platform.
00087     generated = Util::convertPathName(generated.c_str());
00088     gold = Util::convertPathName(gold.c_str());
00089     /* Santiy checks. */
00090     if(!Util::fileReadable(generated.c_str())) {
00091       msg += "Can't open file: " + ToStr(generated.c_str()) + " to read.";
00092       return false;
00093     }
00094     if(!Util::fileReadable(gold.c_str())) {
00095       msg += "Can't open file: " + ToStr(gold.c_str()) + " to read.";
00096       return false;
00097     }
00098     if(!(m_ColSkip >= 0 && m_RowSkip >= 0 && m_Epsilon >= 0)) {
00099       msg += "invalid ColSkip, RowSkip, and/or Epsilon";
00100       return false;
00101     }
00102     /* Count up differences. */
00103     // push handler to throw exception
00104     Err::setThrowStatus(true); 
00105     int diffCount;
00106     try {
00107         diffCount = Util::matrixDifferences(generated.c_str(), gold.c_str() , 
00108                                             m_ColSkip, m_RowSkip, m_Epsilon, false, m_MatchNames);
00109     } 
00110     catch(Except &e) {
00111         msg += "Caught exception: " + ToStr(e.what());
00112         return false;
00113     }
00114     Err::popHandler();
00115 
00116     if(diffCount > (int)m_AllowedMisMatch) {
00117       success = false;
00118       msg += "File: " + generated + " vs " + gold + ": ";
00119       msg += ToStr("Expecting no more than ") + ToStr(m_AllowedMisMatch) + ToStr(" found: ") + ToStr(diffCount);
00120     }
00121     return success;
00122   }
00123 
00124 
00125   std::string m_Generated;   
00126   std::string m_Gold;        
00127   double m_Epsilon;      
00128   int m_RowSkip;        
00129   int m_ColSkip;        
00130   bool m_MatchNames;    
00131 
00132 
00133   unsigned int m_AllowedMisMatch;  
00134 };
